dialogues.speaker: Villager
dialogues.message: You made it to the top of the Elderwood Pedestal!

dialogues.speaker: Villager
dialogues.message: Once, a mighty tree stood here, its roots deep in Thornwood's heart.

dialogues.speaker: Villager
dialogues.message: Now, only this humble stump remains, a silent echo of ancient wisdom.

dialogues.speaker: Villager
dialogues.message: Feel the forest's spirit, for the Elderwood lives on in every leaf in Thornwood.
